resources.string: Java is the primary language used for developing Android apps. Kotlin is another popular language that has been officially supported by Google for Android app development.
Extensible Markup Language (XML) is used to design the user interface of an Android app.
Android Software Development Kit (SDK) provides a set of tools and APIs for developing Android apps.
A JavaScript library for building and training machine learning models in the browser.
A machine learning library in Python for building and training deep learning models.
A high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of TensorFlow, CNTK, or Theano.
The primary programming language for developing iOS apps.
A framework for creating user interfaces on iOS devices.
A framework used for rendering 2D graphics in iOS apps.
Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) is used to structure and create the content of a web page.
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is used to style and layout web pages.
JavaScript is a client-side programming language that is used to add interactivity to web pages.
A JavaScript library for building user interfaces that is often used for developing cyber security applications.
A JavaScript framework for building web applications that is widely used for cyber security development.
A progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces that is gaining popularity for cyber security development.
A JavaScript library for building user interfaces that is often used for developing blockchain applications.
A JavaScript framework for building web applications that is widely used for blockchain development.
A progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces that is gaining popularity for blockchain development.
A high-level Python web framework used for developing server-side applications in the security domain.
A microweb framework in Python that can be used for developing simple and lightweight cyber security applications.
A server-side web application framework written in Ruby that is often used for cyber security development.
An open-source blockchain platform that provides a programming language (Solidity) for writing smart contracts.
An open-source blockchain framework and platform for building decentralized applications and networks.
A decentralized operating system for building blockchain-based applications.
An open-source software library for machine learning and deep learning, used for training and deploying ML models.
A machine learning library in Python for building and training deep learning models.
A deep learning framework developed with clean architecture and expressive code.
A server-side JavaScript runtime environment used for building scalable web applications.
A high-level Python web framework used for developing server-side applications.
A PHP web application framework used for building server-side applications.
Node.js is a JavaScript-based back-end technology that can be used to build fast and scalable backends for web applications.
Django is a high-level Python web framework that can be used to build backends for web applications.
Ruby on Rails is a popular back-end framework for web development that is built using the Ruby programming language.
Firebase is a backend-as-a-service platform that provides a range of services for Android app development, including real-time databases, authentication, and storage.
Node.js is a JavaScript-based back-end technology that can be used to build scalable and fast backends for Android apps.
Django is a high-level Python web framework that can be used to build backends for Android apps.
SQLite is a lightweight and fast relational database that is built into Android and can be used to store app data.
Realm is an object-oriented database that is specifically designed for mobile app development.
MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system that can be used to store data for Android apps.
MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system that is widely used for web development.
MongoDB is a document-oriented NoSQL database that can be used to store unstructured data for web applications.
PostgreSQL is an open-source object-relational database management system that can be used to store structured data for web applications.
A file-based relational database management system that is integrated into iOS by default.
An object graph management and persistency framework used by iOS apps to manage data.
A real-time NoSQL cloud database that provides APIs for storing and synchronizing data across multiple clients.
A highly scalable and available NoSQL database that is used for storing large amounts of data.
An open-source big data processing framework that provides a distributed file system and a framework for batch processing.
A scalable, high-performance object storage system that is used for storing large amounts of data.
A decentralized file storage system that allows for efficient and secure storage of large amounts of data on the blockchain.
A scalable blockchain database that allows for high-throughput transactions and low latency.
A scalable blockchain database that allows for the creation of decentralized applications.
An open-source relational database management system that is widely used for cyber security applications.
A relational database management system developed by Microsoft that is used for cyber security applications.
An object-relational database management system developed by Oracle that is widely used for cyber security development.
